snippet: A nuanced position received the support of Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, the democracy activist who recently won election to public office.
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron meets with Myanmar's democracy activist Daw Aung San Suu Kyi and Pres Thein Sein, saying he supports a suspension but not a lifting of the sanctions against the country; European Union is scheduled to take up the issue on April 23, same day that Aung San Suu Kyi is scheduled to take a seat in Myanmar’s Parliament.
lead_paragraph: A nuanced position received the support of Daw Aung San Suu Kyi, the democracy activist who recently won election to public office.

headline.seo: British Premier Against Lifting of Sanctions on Myanmar
headline.main: British Prime Minister, in Myanmar, Wants Sanctions Suspended but Not Lifted
headline.print_headline: British Premier Against Lifting Of Sanctions On Myanmar
